name: ngapp
description: The zEdit angular application.  See [angular.Module](https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/type/angular.Module) and [Dependency Injection](https://docs.angularjs.org/guide/di).

name: info
description: Object containing information about your module.  Basically just your module.json.

name: modulePath
description: Absolute path for the folder where your module is installed on the user's machine.  Should be prepended to file paths when loading/saving files.

name: moduleUrl
description: `file://` URL for the folder where your module is installed on the user's machine.  Should be prepended to any HTML template/resource URLs.
